GregorianCalendar Class Reference

This header file defines GregorianCalendar. More...

#include <GregorianCalendar.h>

Detailed Description

This header file defines GregorianCalendar. 

       GregorianCalendar* gCalendar = new GregorianCalendar();
       if (gCalendar)
       {
           printf("%s","instance create succ.\n");
           gCalendar->add(1, 1);
           printf("getActualMaximum is %d.\n",gCalendar->getActualMaximum(1));
           printf("getActualMinimum is %d.\n",gCalendar->getActualMinimum(1));
           printf("getGreatestMinimum is %d.\n",gCalendar->getGreatestMinimum(1));
           printf("getLeastMaximum is %d.\n",gCalendar->getLeastMaximum(1));
           printf("getMaximum is %d.\n",gCalendar->getMaximum(1));
           printf("getMinimum is %d.\n",gCalendar->getMinimum(1));
           if(gCalendar->isLeapYear(2000))
           {
               printf("is leap year.\n");
           }
           else
           {
               printf("is not leap year.\n");
           }

           {
               Date* date1 = new Date(1999,9,9,9,9,9);
               Date* date2 = new Date(1991,1,1,1,1,1);
               gCalendar->setGregorianChange(*date2);
               printf("getYear is %d.\n",(gCalendar->getGregorianChange())->getYear());
               printf("getMonth is %d.\n",(gCalendar->getGregorianChange())->getMonth());
               printf("getDay is %d.\n",(gCalendar->getGregorianChange())->getDay());
               printf("getHours is %d.\n",(gCalendar->getGregorianChange())->getHours());
               printf("getMinutes is %d.\n",(gCalendar->getGregorianChange())->getMinutes());
               printf("getSeconds is %d.\n",(gCalendar->getGregorianChange())->getSeconds());
           }
           gCalendar->roll(1, 1);
           gCalendar->roll(1, true);

           delete gCalendar;
           gCalendar = NULL;
       }
       else
       {
           printf("%s","instance create field.\n");
       }
